NAME: Smite
AUTHOR: FlapJack
DESCRIPTION:
Displays Smite player statistics in chat.

You must obtain a HiRez API key at https://fs12.formsite.com/HiRez/form48/secure_index.html to use the API functions in this cog.

Dependencies:
None
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing FlapJack's Smite cog. You must obtain a HiRez API key at https://fs12.formsite.com/HiRez/form48/secure_index.html to use the API functions in this cog.
